ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordTypeId = '0120Y0000002iZt' && OR( ISCHANGED(Lift_Quote_Total_Fee__c), ISCHANGED( Lift_Quote_annual_revenue_tier__c ) ) && Lift_Quote_Total_Fee__c > Lift_Quote_annual_revenue_tier__c
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check Fee and Tier: Fee = price the customer has to pay. Tier = the annual turnover of the customer
